entry.tran: 大规模的；大范围的；大型的
entry.def: A large-scale action or event happens over a very wide area or involves a lot of people or things.
A large-scale map or diagram represents a small area of land or a building or machine on a scale that is large enough for small details to be shown.

example.tran: 一张大比例尺的郡地图
